Package autumn.lang

Interface Lambda

All Superinterfaces:
Functor, TypedFunctor
All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractLambda
public interface Lambda extends TypedFunctor
An instance of this interface is a lambda function.
Author:
Mackenzie

  • Method Details

    • file

      String file()
      This method retrieves the path to the file that contains the lambda.
      Returns:
      the path to the source code file.

    • line

      int line()
      This method retrieves the line-number where the lambda is located.
      Returns:
      the aforedescribed line-number.

    • column

      int column()
      This method retrieves the column-number where the lambda is located.
      Returns:
      the aforedescribed column-number.

    • capture

      void capture(String name, Object value)
      This method is invoked to capture the state of a variable.
      Parameters:
      name - is the name of the variable.
      value - is the value to capture.
      Throws:
      NullPointerException - if the name is null.
      IllegalArgumentException - if the variable was already captured.

    • valueAsBoolean

      boolean valueAsBoolean(String name)
      This method retrieves the value of a previously captured variable as a boolean.
      Parameters:
      name - is the name of the captured variable.
      Returns:
      the value that was in the variable at the time it was captured.
      Throws:
      NullPointerException - if the name is null.
      IllegalStateException - if the name does not refer to a captured variable.

    • valueAsChar

      char valueAsChar(String name)
      This method retrieves the value of a previously captured variable as a char.
      Parameters:
      name - is the name of the captured variable.
      Returns:
      the value that was in the variable at the time it was captured.
      Throws:
      NullPointerException - if the name is null.
      IllegalStateException - if the name does not refer to a captured variable.

    • closure

      Map<String,Object> closure()
      This method creates a map representation of the closure.
      Returns:
      an immutable map containing the values of the captured variables.
